deformablemesh.meshview

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.meshview.Arrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataObject

    public class Arrow
extends Object
implements DataObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Arrow()
      Constructs an Arrow with default length of 1, width of 1/3, tip is 0.5 and tail_fraction is 0.4.
      Arrow(double length, double width)
      Uses default values for tip: 0.5 of length and tail_width: 0.4 of width
      Arrow(double length, double width, double tip)
      Uses default tip tail_width of 0.4 cone width.
      Arrow(double length, double width, double tip, double tail_width)
      Construct an arrow with the supplied geometry

    • Constructor Detail

      • Arrow

        public Arrow()
        Constructs an Arrow with default length of 1, width of 1/3, tip is 0.5 and tail_fraction is 0.4.

      • Arrow

        public Arrow(double length,
             double width)
        Uses default values for tip: 0.5 of length and tail_width: 0.4 of width
        Parameters:
        length - length of arrow along pointing axis from tail to tip.
        width - width of cone for arrowhead.

      • Arrow

        public Arrow(double length,
             double width,
             double tip)
        Uses default tip tail_width of 0.4 cone width.
        Parameters:
        length - length of arrow along pointing axis from tail to tip.
        width - width of cone for arrowhead.
        tip - fraction of length for cone section.
